issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. submit  a report
2. switch to manager view
3. reject the report
4. switch to employee view
5. add or delete a charge
6. click "Home"
7. click "OK"
8. open the report again

Actual result: the change is there
fields.summary: Win8: Changes aren't reverted when user goes back with "Home" button
fields.environment: Windows 8 RP on a VM, tablet simulator

comments.body:
This scenario is most likely of no importance for the demo. I'd resolve this as "Won't Fix". Leaving it up to Russ to decide.

FYI, there is a PR with a fix for this. However, we didn't have time to do proper post-commit testing. Therefore, it wasn't committed. Feel free to disregard it if you decide so.
Closing ticket as Windows Hybrid is no longer supported.
